service.title: Notification for Proxy Caches
service.documentation: A mechanism to enable better functioning of proxies is proposed. This mechanism allows proxies to inform a remote server about transactions performed using the cache and for servers to inform proxies when data becomes stale.

http-header.documentation: The proxy features header is used by a proxy sending data to a server. It specifies the features supported by the specified proxy.
The proxy instruction header is used to reply to a proxy features header. It should only be present when a Proxy-Features header was present in the corresponding request.
